newsitem.title: BULGARIA: Bulgaria sells 40.249 bln levs 1- and 4-wk T-bills.
newsitem.headline: Bulgaria sells 40.249 bln levs 1- and 4-wk T-bills.

text.p: Bulgaria's Finance Ministry on Friday sold two discount T-bill issues with maturities of one week and four weeks, yielding 3.79 percent and 17.59 percent to maturity, respectively, the central bank said.
Bids were received for a total of 52.501 billion levs of T-bills but the ministry approved bids for 40.249 billion levs worth of paper.
The issues were offered with no par value or minimum acceptable price set in advance by the ministry. Auction date and maturity date for each issue overlap.
Details of the issues follow. Prices are in percent of par:
Bids received 27,651.1 million levs 24,849.7 million levs
Bids approved 24,519 million levs 15,729.7 million levs
Avg yield to maturity 3.79 pct 17.59 pct @
